title: Gódur gamall Musso, nuna bara 200þ + 50þ kr!!

posts.text:
Good old Ssangyong Musso, ‘96 diesel, M.Benz engine, 190,000 km, maual transmission, in Reykjavik, 
-> price: 
200,000 kr + 50,000 kr
 for the extra set of winter tires; reason sale: leaving Iceland - soon!
Góður gamlall Ssangyong Musso, ‘96, dísil, M.Benz vél, 190þ km, verð 
200þ + 50þ kr
 fyrir nagla dekk
